verses.verse: Paul <S%G3972><s%>, an <S%G652>apostle<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5095>Timothy<s%> our <S%G80>brother<s%>,

To the <S%G40>saints<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> that are <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2857>Colossae<s%>: <S%G5485>Grace<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%>.

We give <S%G2168>thanks<s%> to God2316, 2532 the <S%G3962>Father<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G4336>praying<s%> <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>,

having <S%G191>heard<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G26>love<s%> which ye have <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G40>saints<s%>,

because <S%G1223><s%> of the <S%G1680>hope<s%> which is laid <S%G606>up<s%> for <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3772>heavens<s%>, <S%G3739>whereof<s%> ye heard <S%G4257>before<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of the <S%G225>truth<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel<s%>,

which is <S%G3918>come<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>; even <S%G2531>as<s%> it is also <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> bearing <S%G2592>fruit<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2531>increasing<s%>, as it doth <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>, <S%G575>since<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> ye <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1921>knew<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G225>truth<s%>;

even <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G3129>ye<s%> <S%G3129>learned<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G1889>Epaphras<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G4889>fellow-servant<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> a <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G1249>minister<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> on <S%G5216>our<s%> <S%G5228>behalf<s%>,
who <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1213>declared<s%> unto <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>.

For <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G1223>cause<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>, <S%G575>since<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> we <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3973>it<s%>, do <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3973>cease<s%> to <S%G4336>pray<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> make <S%G154>request<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> ye may be filled <S%G4137>with<s%> the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2307>will<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4907>understanding<s%>,

4043, Romans9 to <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G516>worthily<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G699>pleasing<s%>, bearing <S%G2592>fruit<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G837>increasing<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>;

strengthened <S%G1412><s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2904>power<s%>, according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G1411>might<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%>, <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5281>patience<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3115>longsuffering<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%>;

giving <S%G2168>thanks<s%> unto the <S%G3962>Father<s%>, who <S%G2427>made<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G2427>meet<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> be <S%G3310>partakers<s%> of the <S%G2819>inheritance<s%> of the <S%G40>saints<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5457>light<s%>;

who <S%G3739><s%> <S%G4506>delivered<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G1537>out<s%> of the <S%G1849>power<s%> of <S%G4655>darkness<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3179>translated<s%> us <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G26>love<s%>;
in <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> our <S%G629>redemption<s%>, the <S%G859>forgiveness<s%> of our <S%G266>sins<s%>:
who <S%G3739><s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G1504>image<s%> of the <S%G517>invisible<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, the <S%G4416>firstborn<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2937>creation<s%>;

for <S%G3754><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2936>were<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G2936>created<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3772>heavens<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> upon the <S%G1093>earth<s%>, things <S%G3707>visible<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> things <S%G517>invisible<s%>, <S%G1535>whether<s%> <S%G2362>thrones<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G2963>dominions<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G746>principalities<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G1849>powers<s%>; all <S%G3956>things<s%> have been <S%G2936>created<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>;
and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G4921>consist<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G2776>head<s%> of the <S%G4983>body<s%>, the <S%G1577>church<s%>: <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G746>beginning<s%>, the <S%G4416>firstborn<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%>; <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1096>might<s%> have the <S%G4409>preeminence<s%>.
For <S%G3754><s%> it was the good <S%G2106>pleasure<s%> of the Father that <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2730>should<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4138>fulness<s%> <S%G2730>dwell<s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> him to <S%G604>reconcile<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%>, having made <S%G1517>peace<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4716>cross<s%>; <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, I <S%G1535>say<s%>, whether <S%G3588>things<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>, <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G3588>things<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> the <S%G3772>heavens<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, being <S%G1271>in<s%> time <S%G4218>past<s%> <S%G526>alienated<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2190>enemies<s%> <S%G1271>in<s%> your <S%G1271>mind<s%> in your <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>,

yet <S%G3570>now<s%> hath he <S%G604>reconciled<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%>, to <S%G3936>present<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> without <S%G299>blemish<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G410>unreproveable<s%> <S%G2714>before<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>:

if <S%G1489><s%> so be that ye continue <S%G1961>in<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%>, <S%G2311>grounded<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1476>stedfast<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> moved <S%G3334>away<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G1680>hope<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> ye <S%G191>heard<s%>, which was <S%G2784>preached<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2937>creation<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>; <S%G3739>whereof<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> was <S%G1096>made<s%> a <S%G1249>minister<s%>.

Now <S%G3568><s%> <S%G3739>I<s%> <S%G5463>rejoice<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3804>sufferings<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2532>sake<s%>, and fill <S%G466>up<s%> on my part that which is <S%G5303>lacking<s%> of the <S%G2347>afflictions<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%>'s <S%G5228>sake<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%>;

whereof <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> was <S%G1096>made<s%> a <S%G1249>minister<s%>, according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G3622>dispensation<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> which was <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G5209>you-ward<s%>, to <S%G4137>fulfil<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>,

even the <S%G3466>mystery<s%> which hath been <S%G613>hid<s%> <S%G575>for<s%> <S%G165>ages<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1074>generations<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3570>now<s%> hath it been <S%G5319>manifested<s%> <S%G40>to<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G40>saints<s%>,

to <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> was <S%G2309>pleased<s%> to make <S%G1107>known<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> is the <S%G4149>riches<s%> of the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G3466>mystery<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>, the <S%G1680>hope<s%> of <S%G1391>glory<s%>:

whom <S%G3739><s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G2605>proclaim<s%>, <S%G3560>admonishing<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1321>teaching<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> we may <S%G3936>present<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G5046>perfect<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>;

whereunto <S%G1519><s%> <S%G2872>I<s%> <S%G2872>labor<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>, <S%G75>striving<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1753>working<s%>, which <S%G1754>worketh<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1698>me<s%> <S%G1411>mightily<s%>.
